# quartodoc

Generate python API documentation for quarto.

## Install

## Basic use

```{python}
from quartodoc import get_function, MdRenderer

# get function object ---
f_obj = get_function("quartodoc", "get_function")

# render ---
renderer = MdRenderer(header_level = 1)
print(
    renderer.to_md(f_obj)
)
```
